amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 115-766 to require a report from HHS on opioid prescribing practices and opioid misuse during pregnancy, and evaluating non-opiate pain management practices during pregnancy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Curtis amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Curtis.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Curtis amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
